column4: my 5.1 surround system only works as 2 channels, how do i fix this?
if you're using pulseaudio, you need to edit the config file /etc/pulse/default.pa
for example I have the line 'load-module module-alsa-sink device="surround51"'
/etc/pulse/default.pa
are you talking ot me?
well, just the line 'load-module module-alsa-sink device="surround51"' AFAIK
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=795525 may be a better place to look
what are trying to do with the microphone?
OK, well, I just changed the name of the ALSA device in my pulseaudio config
that works fine for me, but I'm still using Jaunty
are you saying that some of the jacks can be either inputs or outputs?
well, I don't know anything specific about Karmic, and if your issue might be something specific to your hardware
yeah, I think I may just go back to Jaunty on my laptop for now
